message: Also check out https://ext.ulauncher.io/-/... if this extension isn't for you. There is an extra step involved, which wasn't what I wanted (already used to direct access), but it's very well written and looks great. You can also change the NoDisplay property of the desktop entries and then wouldn't need any extension at all. The github page details how to do this: https://github.com/friday/u...
author: Albin Larsson
